xdb
Interface XML

All Known Subinterfaces:
XSLT
public abstract interface XML

The objectifizer of an XML or XML-like document. It also acts as facade/proxy of the XML/DOM/XPath/XSLT implementations.

Method Summary
 org.w3c.dom.Document getDOM()
           
 recordset getRecordset()
           
 URI getURI()
           
 void load()
          Retrieves and loads the XML document at its URI
 java.lang.String load(java.lang.String xPointer)
          Reads an attribute or element content from the document.
 void save()
          Persistently stores the XML document at its URI (which has to be a file-URI)
 void setURI(URI resource)

Method Detail

setURI

public void setURI(URI resource)
Parameters:
resource - The desired URI of the XML document

getURI

public URI getURI()
Returns:
The URI of the XML document

getRecordset

public recordset getRecordset()
                       throws xdbException
Returns:
A recordset representation of the XML documentation. Eventual future changes to the XML document leave the recordset unaffected.
Throws:
xdbException - XML document not conform to the recordset DTD

load

public java.lang.String load(java.lang.String xPointer)
                      throws xdbException
Reads an attribute or element content from the document.
Parameters:
xPointer - The path of the property. No wildcards and recursing is allowed however.
Returns:
The property's value
Throws:
xdbException - Path pointed to not found

store

public void store(java.lang.String xPointer,
                  java.lang.String value)
Writes an attribute or element content to the document.
Parameters:
xPointer - The path of the property. No wildcards and recursing is allowed however.
value - The new property's value

getDOM

public org.w3c.dom.Document getDOM()
Returns:
The document representation as specified in DOM1.0

save

public void save()
          throws xdbException
Persistently stores the XML document at its URI (which has to be a file-URI)
Throws:
xdbException - Storing not successful

load

public void load()
          throws xdbException
Retrieves and loads the XML document at its URI
Throws:
xdbException - Retrieving or parsing not successful; the object still represents the prior successfully loaded document.
